channel.title: CVE Feed for Biteship -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-49767|2024-08-02T22:01:26.007Z -- biteship -- biteship%3A%20plugin%20ongkos%20kirim%20kurir%20instant%2C%20reguler%2C%20kargo
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Biteship Biteship: Plugin Ongkos Kirim Kurir Instant, Reguler, Kargo allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Biteship: Plugin Ongkos Kirim Kurir Instant, Reguler, Kargo: from n/a through 2.2.24.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Biteship Biteship: Plugin Ongkos Kirim Kurir Instant, Reguler, Kargo allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Biteship: Plugin Ongkos Kirim Kurir Instant, Reguler, Kargo: from n/a through 2.2.24.
